QuestData.Title: Broken Harts
QuestData.Description:
The curse on Qadarin is a powerful one.
But I will break it.
<Thiernax snorts.>
Death did not part us. I will not be torn from him now.
<Thiernax studies both you and Shandris with a serious look in his eyes.>
Lend me your aid, and in turn I will help you with your world's Night Warrior. I do not promise I can save her... but I will share all that I know.
Return to the Heart of the Forest and tell Lord Herne what has happened. We will meet there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Lord Herne at the Heart of the Forest, then speak with Moonberry.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Moonberry in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: I bet those spriggan thought this would be pretty funny. Well, we're not laughing!
